 https://evolvevacationrental.com/200000
Welcome to our beautiful home!!
WEEKDAY $115
WEEKEND in Spring $125; in Summer $162.50
Located in South Lake Tahoe, our cabin is an A-frame with over 1300 square feet of living space.
The house is completely done with pine interior to give you that authentic cabin feel. The cabin has also just be remodeled with hardwood floors throughout. There is a washer and dryer, a kitchen stocked with all your cooking needs and games for both children and adults. Enjoy miles of national forest trails across the street!
We are happy to rent our house to families or small numbers of individuals (8 adults maximum). One downstairs bedroom has bunk beds, the other bedroom has a queen bed and a crib. The loft upstairs has a queen bed, a full size bed and a kid bed.
There is a front deck that receives lots of sunshine and a picnic table and barbeque in the back yard. The house is on a corner, on a half-acre of land and is next to vacant lots. Across the street is national forest land with miles of trails for walking, biking and cross-country skiing. We highly recommend visiting the river, a short walk away through the national forest land at the end of our street.
The house is located less than 5 miles from Heavenly Ski Resort, 10 minutes from Lake Tahoe and 15 minutes from the downtown casino area. Sierra-at-Tahoe is about a 20-minute drive. In the summer, there are several golf courses within 15 minutes as well as a disk golf course at Bijou Park.
High speed wireless Internet. Cable TV and over 100 DVDs.
For full description, 16 pictures and the ability to book online in real time, please visit my complete listing at: https://evolvevacationrental.com/200000

postings.heading: Charming Spacious Walk to Davis Square. Parking INCLUDED

postings.body:
* We still have weeks in August for this beautiful vacation house. We rent from Sunday to Sunday.
* It is a great rate of 1,550 dollars for a week.
* Dates available are:
August 10 - August 17
August 17 - August 24
* You will surely enjoy your stay at this cottage, which is located in a very private exclusive area. It is located in the town of Wareham, the gateway to Cape Cod. This area offers you all that Cape Cod has to offer without all the crowds. It is located in a very quiet neighborhood and it has a big backyard for entertaining. It is a minute walk to a private association beach and to the Public Harbor Beach.
* With a view of the ocean, a constant ocean breeze, beautiful sunsets, and being a hundred yards from the swimming beach, you will surely delight yourself in this vacation.
* This cottage is a cute doll house, furnished in a nautical cape cod theme, and we pride ourselves in keeping it clean for our guests.
*There is 3 BEDROOMS, and sleeps five to six people comfortably. One bedroom has a double bed. The second bedroom has two twin beds. The patio bedroom has a twin bed. And the living room has a pull out queen couch. ALL BEDROOMS HAVE FRESH CLEAN LINENS.
* In the skylit kitchen there is a stove, microwave, fridge, and coffee pot. The kitchen is stocked with dishes, glasses, silverware, and pots and pans for vacationers use.
* There is a 42 inch TELEVISION with Verizon, a DVD PLAYER with a DVD collection.
* Free HIGH SPEED INTERNET connection.
* VERIZON TELEPHONE in house for renters use.
* There is also a utility room with a WASHING MACHINE AND DRYER.
* The Beautiful spacious backyard has plenty of room to entertain and barbecue. There is a picnic table, BARBEQUE GAS GRILL, and outdoor furniture, volley ball net, disc golf, and adorn dace chairs. There is an OUTDOOR SHOWER also.
* There is plenty of room for parking.
* There is a DECK ON THE SIDE OF THE HOUSE WITH AN OCEAN VIEW. The house is three houses from the ocean.
* Pets are welcome, and are welcome to enjoy the private association beach, but you need to clean up after their droppings.
***** OCEAN: There is a private association beach, and also the public Little Harbor Beach a short one minute walk away. The beach has quiet crowds. You can walk the beach for miles, find unique seashells, enjoy low and high tides, plenty of space to play in the sand. Beautiful sunsets each night. Bring your kayaks, wind surfing gear, and boat (launching area five minutes from house), and fishing poles to fish at the Wareham pier or along the Cape Cod Canal.
* If you love to GOLF the cottage is a short walk to the 18 hole Little harbor Golf course (http://www.littleharborcountryclub.com).
* This area is filled with many FUN VACATION ATTRACTIONS. Bring your bikes and enjoy the bike paths in the neighborhood or the beautiful bicycle trails on the cape cod canal. Bring kayaks and use them right at the beach. There are daily harbor ferry rides, many unique antique stores to enjoy, the Water Wizz Water Park (http://www.waterwizz.com) in wareham, mini golf, go-carts, baseball batting cages, candle pin bowling, ice cream shops, and kayak/canoe rentals all within 15 minutes of the house.
* It is only half hour car ride to the FERRY in Wood`s Hole or New Bedford, So you can spend a day on Martha`s Vineyard or Nantucket.
*There is many fantastic RESTAURANTS within ten minutes. Get the best fried seafood at the local Captain Al`s Restaurant, eat Lobster in the rough at Eastwind Lobster, or the best clam chowder at The Lobster Pot. Other great restaurants include The well known Mezza Luna, Lindsey`s, Ella`s Brick Oven, or Baileys. Also there are many breakfast places to enjoy including Percy`s, Leo`s, the Cranberry Cottage, and the Crack O` dawn.
* The house is close to shopping and grocery centers (10 minutes. One shopping plaza can be reviewed here: (http://www.warehamcrossing.com).
* It only takes 1 hour in driving time from Boston.
* Rate: 1,550 a week.
*****Book your vacation now, don`t delay!
